projects.name: The Operational Strategy of an Online Food Delivery Platform by Considering the Characteristics of Delivery Agents in the Three-Sided Market
projects.summary: This research project explores the dynamics of online food delivery platforms, which function as three-sided markets connecting restaurants, delivery drivers, and consumers. The study investigates platform-to-restaurant contracts, delivery time management for drivers, and the role of government intervention in promoting social welfare.
highlights: National Natural Science Foundation of China, 72301107, 300,000 RMB

projects.name: Core Technology Development and Application Demonstration for a Trade Finance Open Platform
projects.summary: This research project focuses on developing a blockchain-based trade finance platform for facilitating multinational digital currency exchanges.
highlights: National Key Research and Development Program of China, 1.15/12.35M RMB
